title: post api v1 improve prompt valid input
description: Test the POST /api/v1/improve-prompt endpoint with a valid idea, context, and guardrails to verify it returns a 200 status with improved prompt, confidence score, quality gate data, and degradation flags.

title: post api v1 improve prompt empty idea
description: Test the POST /api/v1/improve-prompt endpoint with an empty idea string to verify it returns a 400 status with an error indicating invalid input.

title: post api v1 improve prompt llm provider unavailable
description: Test the POST /api/v1/improve-prompt endpoint when the LLM provider is not configured or the circuit breaker is open to verify it returns a 503 status with appropriate error message and degradation flags.

title: get health check healthy status
description: Test the GET /health endpoint when the server and DSPy/LLM provider are properly configured to verify it returns a 200 status with healthy status and provider details.

title: get health check degraded status
description: Test the GET /health endpoint when DSPy or LLM provider configuration is missing to verify it returns a 200 status with degraded status and null provider/model fields.

title: get health check service unavailable
description: Test the GET /health endpoint when the server fails to start or dependencies are unavailable to verify it returns a 503 status with service_unavailable error.

title: get api v1 metrics summary success
description: Test the GET /api/v1/metrics/summary endpoint to verify it returns a 200 status with total prompts, average quality, performance, impact, and grade distribution metrics.

title: get api v1 metrics summary database missing
description: Test the GET /api/v1/metrics/summary endpoint when SQLite persistence is not configured or database is missing to verify it returns a 503 status with metrics_unavailable error.

title: get api v1 metrics trends valid days parameter
description: Test the GET /api/v1/metrics/trends endpoint with a valid positive integer days parameter to verify it returns a 200 status with periods and trends data.

title: get api v1 metrics trends invalid days parameter
description: Test the GET /api/v1/metrics/trends endpoint with a negative days parameter to verify it returns a 400 status with invalid_parameter error.
